channel.title: P16 Blitz NPC GLITCH!
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to fix the 1hp glitch with npc's on p16 blitz?
GLITCH: If an npc gets to 1hp then it stays at that hp, it wont be able to die unless someone mage or ranges it[br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2007, 08:02:32 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?
